function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid and global spread of a contagious epidemic","Impact":"Lockdown measures and business closures leading to economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective lockdown measures and border closures, vaccination campaigns, and public health initiatives","Technologies":"ICTs for tracking and monitoring, vaccine development and dissemination technologies","People":"General public, businesses, city governments","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, businesses"},{"Description":"Neglect of public health in strategic planning","Impact":"Failure to effectively respond to environmental pressures and public health crises","Mitigation":"Integration of public health priorities in strategic planning, allocation of resources to public health initiatives, and collaboration with public health organizations","Technologies":"Health tracking and monitoring technologies, data analysis tools for public health decision-making","People":"City governments, public health organizations","Owner":"City governments, public health organizations"}]}
